front.title: A Unified Proposal for Server-to-Server Presence and Instant Messaging

abstract.t: Standardization of Instant Message and Presence Protocols in the IETF has resulted in multiple protocols. There are significant industry and technical advantages to standardizing a unified approach for server-to-server Instant Messaging and Presence. This document proposes a server profile which uses SIP to exchange presence and setup sessions, and XMPP for message transport.
